channel.title: CVE Feed for Flexera Software LLC -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Flexera Software LLC -- all products

item.title: CVE-2018-20032|2024-08-05T11:51:18.821Z -- flexera%20software%20llc -- flexnet%20publisher
item.description: A Denial of Service vulnerability related to message decoding in lmgrd and vendor daemon components of FlexNet Publisher version 11.16.1.0 and earlier allows a remote attacker to send a combination of messages to lmgrd or the vendor daemon, causing the heartbeat between lmgrd and the vendor daemon to stop, and the vendor daemon to shut down.

item.title: CVE-2018-20034|2024-08-05T11:51:18.806Z -- flexera%20software%20llc -- flexnet%20publisher
item.description: A Denial of Service vulnerability related to adding an item to a list in lmgrd and vendor daemon components of FlexNet Publisher version 11.16.1.0 and earlier allows a remote attacker to send a combination of messages to lmgrd or the vendor daemon, causing the heartbeat between lmgrd and the vendor daemon to stop, and the vendor daemon to shut down.

item.title: CVE-2018-5819|2024-08-05T05:47:55.378Z -- flexera%20software%20llc -- libraw
item.description: An error within the "parse_sinar_ia()" function (internal/dcraw_common.cpp) within LibRaw versions prior to 0.19.1 can be exploited to exhaust available CPU resources.

item.title: CVE-2018-5817|2024-08-05T05:47:55.867Z -- flexera%20software%20llc -- libraw
item.description: A type confusion error within the "unpacked_load_raw()" function within LibRaw versions prior to 0.19.1 (internal/dcraw_common.cpp) can be exploited to trigger an infinite loop.

item.title: CVE-2018-20030|2024-08-05T11:51:18.314Z -- flexera%20software%20llc -- libexif
item.description: An error when processing the EXIF_IFD_INTEROPERABILITY and EXIF_IFD_EXIF tags within libexif version 0.6.21 can be exploited to exhaust available CPU resources.

item.title: CVE-2018-20031|2024-08-05T11:51:18.328Z -- flexera%20software%20llc -- flexnet%20publisher
item.description: A Denial of Service vulnerability related to preemptive item deletion in lmgrd and vendor daemon components of FlexNet Publisher version 11.16.1.0 and earlier allows a remote attacker to send a combination of messages to lmgrd or the vendor daemon, causing the heartbeat between lmgrd and the vendor daemon to stop, and the vendor daemon to shut down.

item.title: CVE-2018-20033|2024-08-05T11:51:18.821Z -- flexera%20software%20llc -- flexnet%20publisher
item.description: A Remote Code Execution vulnerability in lmgrd and vendor daemon components of FlexNet Publisher version 11.16.1.0 and earlier could allow a remote attacker to corrupt the memory by allocating / deallocating memory, loading lmgrd or the vendor daemon and causing the heartbeat between lmgrd and the vendor daemon to stop. This would force the vendor daemon to shut down. No exploit of this vulnerability has been demonstrated.
